scripts.all:build: npm run web:build && npm run app:build && npm run admin:build
scripts.all:lint: npm run web:lint && npm run app:lint && npm run admin:lint
scripts.all:test: npm run web:test && npm run app:test && npm run admin:test
scripts.admin:build: npm run build:prep && ng build --project admin --prod --aot
scripts.admin:build:env: npm run build:prep && ng build --project admin --prod --aot --configuration=${environment}
scripts.admin:build:watch: npm run build:prep && ng build --project admin --watch
scripts.admin:start: npm run build:prep && ng serve --project admin --port=4201 --proxy-config ./projects/admin/proxy.conf.json --source-map
scripts.admin:start:docker: npm run build:prep:docker && node ./build-util/initial-install.js && ng serve --project admin --port=4201 --proxy-config ./projects/admin/docker-proxy.conf.json --source-map --host 0.0.0.0 --disableHostCheck=true
scripts.admin:test: npm run build:prep && npm run admin:lint && ng test --project admin --watch=false --code-coverage --source-map
scripts.admin:test:watch: npm run build:prep && ng test --project admin --code-coverage --source-map
scripts.app:build: npm run build:prep && ng build --project app --baseHref=./ --prod --aot
scripts.app:build:prepare: npm run app:build && npm run app:prepare
scripts.app:build:release: npm run app:clean && npm run app:build:prepare && npm run app:cordova:build
scripts.app:build:watch: npm run build:prep && ng build --watch --project app --configuration app --baseHref=./ --output-path=./www
scripts.app:start: npm run build:prep && ionic cordova run browser --debug --livereload --source-map --configuration=browser
scripts.app:start:docker: npm run build:prep:docker && node ./build-util/initial-install.js && ionic cordova run browser --debug --livereload --external --source-map --configuration=browser
scripts.build:env: npm run build:prep && ng build --project web --prod --aot --configuration=${environment}
scripts.build:watch: npm run build:prep && npm run web:build:watch
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rimraf ./node_modules && npm run clean:mobile
scripts.web:build: npm run build:prep && ng build --project web --prod --aot
scripts.web:build:watch: npm run build:prep && ng build --project web --watch
scripts.web:start: npm run build:prep && ng serve --project web --proxy-config ./projects/web/proxy.conf.json --source-map
scripts.web:start:docker: npm run build:prep:docker && node ./build-util/initial-install.js && ng serve --project web --proxy-config ./projects/web/docker-proxy.conf.json --source-map --host 0.0.0.0 --disableHostCheck=true
scripts.web:start:es5: npm run build:prep && ng serve --configuration es5 --project web --proxy-config ./projects/web/proxy.conf.json --source-map
scripts.web:start:hmr: npm run build:prep && ng serve --configuration hmr --project web --proxy-config ./projects/web/proxy.conf.json --source-map
scripts.web:test: npm run build:prep && npm run web:lint && ng test --project web --watch=false --code-coverage --source-map
scripts.web:test:watch: npm run build:prep && ng test --project web --code-coverage --source-map
